title: Participatory Interview Skill Competency Enhancement Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job interview experience or possession of communication skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of animated video clips and blog-based interactions using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively respond to three or more advanced question types (e.g., behavior-based, situational judgment) in mock interviews within four weeks
Participants can improve interview response structures by 80% or more based on peer feedback
Learners can proactively design the five-step interview preparation process through animated video clippings and blog activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
